description: The job title is Frontend Engineer Intern, and the description is as follows: Frontend Engineer Intern: Responsible for aligning web design and user experience requirements, optimizing web pages, and maintaining brand consistency. Collaborate with back-end developers, graphic designers, and UX designers. Required skills: ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, NextJS. 3-month evaluative unpaid internship with potential for return offers.SKILLS: ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.
